titles.title: Accurate Weather for Public Safety Act
Accurate Weather for Public Safety Act
Accurate Weather for Public Safety Act
To study the effects of new construction of obstructions on accurate weather forecasting, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.
